author: gezero
content:
Hello, sorry for bothering, when trying out the withdrawals we are getting the following from CL:
```JSON
{
  timestamp=0x63739380,
  prevRandao=0x5bb544e5860d182cafb99ad988e13028e71cc061849172639fad1592e6fd1950,
  suggestedFeeRecipient=0xe7c180eada8f60d63e9671867b2e0ca2649207a8,
  withdrawals=[
  {
    index=0x0,
    validatorIndex=0x0,
    address=0x474b370ea8cf547386a75bd72e0e668e0f1b2f40,
    recipient=0x474b370ea8cf547386a75bd72e0e668e0f1b2f40,
    amount=0xb7fe920e800
  }
```
what is the recipient on the withdrawal? When looking here https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/blob/main/src/engine/specification.md#withdrawalv1, I cannot see any such field on the WithdrawalV1

author: barnabasbusa
content: For a bit of context CL in this case is Lodestar
